Row.Text: The Pictish Warrior is the Celt unique unit. Like the Spearman it replaces, the Pictish Warrior gets a significant combat bonus against mounted units. Perfectly suited for early rushes, a Pictish Warrior can lay waste to an opponents' lands, quickly pillaging and moving within the same turn. Additionally, they earn [ICON_PEACE] Faith for each unit they kill, constantly advancing your religious goals while at war, or when protecting your lands from barbarians.
